name: Alaala
description:
Improve your brain power with this memory / cards matching game!

Train your brain by playing this memory game. Classic match two cards game.
Play in Easy, Medium, or Hard modes.
Change the cards deck images.

How to Play:
1. Take turns to flip and match cards.

Challenge yourself:
-Try to match all cards in the less amount of tries.
-How fast can you match them all?

Originally designed for for Android, adapted for web.

Get the original game in Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.JLHM.XR.Alaala

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/JLHM.XR
